name: QRExpress
description: A free, open, no-registration QR code generator web application. Create, customize, and download high-quality QR codes in multiple formats.
browserRequirements: Requires JavaScript; Modern browser (Chrome 90+, Firefox 88+, Safari 14+, Edge 90+)
featureList: QR Code Generation (9 types: URL, WiFi, Email, SMS, Phone, Geo, Contact, Text, WhatsApp)
Customizable Design (Colors, dot styles, corner styles, logo branding)
Multiple Export Formats (PNG raster, SVG vector)
18 Professional Templates (Plain, ScanMe, WiFi, Portfolio, Contact, Feedback, Social, Product, Event, Review, Order, Pay, Community, Video, Book, Report, Download, Coupon)
Scannability Score (Real-time QR code quality assessment)
iOS Preview Simulator (Live preview of scanning experience)
Multi-language Support (5 languages: English, Italian, Romanian, Russian, Ukrainian)
No Registration Required (Instant QR code creation)
Free Forever (No paywall, no premium features)
Privacy-First (All processing done locally in browser)
